channel.title: [TUT] How to use scar
channel.description:
:o Well I once made a quite good scar guide ;) I dont know if anyone knows this one but anyway I think its a good idea to post a link to it...
[b]Here it is:[/b] [b]Click[/b] -> http://www.icpnet.pl/~pest/ScarGuide.swf
I hope that some of You that still dont know how to use scar will now know how to...
